explains: v. 证明；示范，演示；表露；游行，示威

sentences.en: We must demonstrate that aggression will not pay.
sentences.cn: 我们必须证明侵犯是没有好处的。

sentences.en: We want to demonstrate our commitment to human rights.
sentences.cn: 我们想表明我们对人权的信念。

sentences.en: These results demonstrate convincingly that our campaign is working.
sentences.cn: 这些结果有力地证明，我们的运动正在发挥作用。
